info.title: Laravel Team Api Documentation
info.description: API documentation for the PHP Laravel HNG Team

get.description: Fetches a list of all products from the database.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of products.

delete.description: Deletes a specific product by its ID.

schema.description: The unique identifier of the product to be deleted.

post.description: Adds an item to the system

parameters.name: user_subscription_id
parameters.description: The ID of the user subscription to be canceled.

409.description: subscription plan has already been cancelled.

message.example: subscription plan has already been cancelled.

cancellation_reason.example: I dont like the service again
